title: Wild new DJI FPV drone lets you control its flight by moving your hand, up to 87mph!
content:
The all-new DJI FPV drone gives you more intuitive motion control and HD goggles, completely changing the way you fly and film from the air. It flies like a racing drone, hovers like a camera drone, and accelerates and stops faster than anything they’ve made before. DJI has been making FPV (first person view) goggles […]

The post Wild new DJI FPV drone lets you control its flight by moving your hand, up to 87mph! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
